Description: UP FOR SALE IS A BURNS APACHE GUITAR IN EXCELLENT WORKING ORDER IT COMES WITH A CASE CROCODILE SKIN DESIGN ONE OF BEST SOUNDING GUITARS DUPLICATES THE SHADOWS HANK MARVIN SOUND ALL SALES ARE FINAL NO RETURNS ASK ALL QUESTION PRIOR TO YOUR BID PLEASE READ: Gorgeous top of the line New Burns Special Edition Apache guitar, beautiful protective hard shell case. This guitar is stunning. This is limited Special Edition Apache guitar that is loaded with every top of the line option. The pictures do not do the guitar justice, it is gorgeous. I did play it briefly and it plays as good as it looks. It has incomparable design, craftsmanship, attention to detail and performance that can only be duplicated by Burns of London top of the line guitars. See the specs below. The shipping cost includes safe packing, insurance, prompt shipping and tracking number. Buy with confidence, see my feedback. Body made from selected American alder Bolt-on neck from 5-star Canadian maple Ebony fretboard Scale: 648 mm Nut width: 43 mm Neck radius: 300 mm 22 Frets Pearl DOT inlays Apache pearl inlay on the 12th fret Pearl neck binding Scroll headstock Pickups: 3 Burns Rez-O-Matik noiseless single coils 1 Volume- and 2 tone controls (push/pull tone control switches the neck pickup) 5-Way pickup switch Pearl white pickguard Burns deluxe bridge Burns Rez-O-Tube tremolo with Apache engraving Burns deluxe locking machine heads Gold hardware Burns Gear-O-Matik Gearbox truss rod
Title: BURNS APACHE GUITAR WITH TREMOLO
